helpgrid.innerhtml: Select Refresh to update the progress of the session.

section.description: Do you want to save your changes before continuing?

helpgrid.innerhtml: Specify the default values for all merged, validated, imported, updated, and exported sessions for the site.
Specify the default values to apply to each record that is created during the import.
Specifiy the initial status to apply to all records that are created during the import.
Specify the default values for all imported, validated, merged, updated, and exported sessions for the site.
Specify how each identifier is converted during the import, validate, merge, update, and export sessions.
Import a single OmniClass table that is in .csv, .xls or .xlxs format into the Maximo classification hierarchy.
Select the record types whose status you want to change from the selected current status to the selected new status.
Specify the attributes that are copied from COBie files to Maximo fields.
Specify the Maximo attribute types that are used to create specifications from COBie attributes.
Import a single Uniformat table that is in .csv, .xls or .xlxs format into the Maximo classification hierarchy.
